item_name: Robbie Basho - Visions of the Country (1978)
notes: 2025-01-06. 12-string fingerpicking & piano w intensity, vulnerability. Vibrato-rich mystical vocal. Hypnotic, shimmering.
Rock, avant-garde musician, producer, Chicago, active 1989-.

connection_labels: released on Domino (Jim in UK; JB in US)

item_name: Robbie Basho - The Falconer's Arm I (1967)

notes: 2025-01-06. Incredibly mellow. Nice synth key, horn timbres. Night Walk like Blue Nile meets Earthbound OST.
